# SEQ24 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 24 focuses on knit the inside of the building to the outside

## Category
Buildings

## Patterns
apl172, apl173, apl174, apl175, apl176, apl177, apl178, apl179, apl180, apl181, apl182

## Emergent Phenomena
Buildings that open to and engage with their surroundings rather than turning inward

## Overview
This sequence contains 11 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
